verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast <S%H2713>searched<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>, and known me.
Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> my <S%H3427>downsitting<s%> and mine <S%H6965>uprising<s%>; Thou <S%H995>understandest<s%> my <S%H7454>thought<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
Thou <S%H2219>searchest<s%> out my <S%H734>path<s%> and my lying <S%H7252>down<s%>, And art <S%H5532>acquainted<s%> with all my <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For there is not a <S%H4405>word<s%> in my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, <S%H3068>But<s%>, lo, O Jehovah, thou knowest it <S%H3045>altogether<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H6696>beset<s%> me <S%H268>behind<s%> and <S%H6924>before<s%>, And <S%H7896>laid<s%> thy hand upon <S%H3709>me<s%>.
Such <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is too <S%H6383>wonderful<s%> for <S%H7682>me<s%>; It is high, I cannot attain unto <S%H3201>it<s%>.
Whither shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> from thy <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>? Or whither shall I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>?
If I ascend <S%H5266>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, thou art <S%H3331>there<s%>: If I make my bed in <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, behold, thou art there.
If I <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%>, And <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the uttermost <S%H319>parts<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>;
Even there shall thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H3225>me<s%>, And thy right hand shall hold <S%H270>me<s%>.
If I <S%H559>say<s%>, Surely the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H7779>overwhelm<s%> <S%H216>me<s%>, And the light about <S%H1157>me<s%> shall be <S%H3915>night<s%>;

Even the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H2821>hideth<s%> not from <S%H3915>thee<s%>, But the night <S%H215>shineth<s%> as the <S%H3117>day<s%>: The <S%H2825>darkness<s%> and the light are both alike to <S%H219>thee<s%>.
For thou didst <S%H7069>form<s%> my <S%H3629>inward<s%> <S%H5526>parts<s%>: Thou didst cover me in my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb<s%>.

I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3372>thee<s%>; For I am fearfully and wonderfully <S%H6395>made<s%>: <S%H6381>Wonderful<s%> are thy <S%H4639>works<s%>; And that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> right <S%H3966>well<s%>.

My <S%H6108>frame<s%> was not <S%H3582>hidden<s%> from <S%H6213>thee<s%>, When I was made in <S%H5643>secret<s%>, And curiously <S%H7551>wrought<s%> in the lowest <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> mine <S%H1564>unformed<s%> <S%H5612>substance<s%>; And in thy book they were all <S%H3789>written<s%>, Even the <S%H3117>days<s%> that were <S%H3335>ordained<s%> for <S%H259>me<s%>, When as yet there was none of them.
How <S%H3365>precious<s%> also are thy <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> unto <S%H410>me<s%>, O God! How <S%H6105>great<s%> is the sum of <S%H7218>them<s%>!
If I should <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H7235>them<s%>, they are more in number than the <S%H2344>sand<s%>: When I <S%H6974>awake<s%>, I am still with <S%H5750>thee<s%>.
Surely thou wilt <S%H6991>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, O <S%H433>God<s%>: <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from me <S%H1818>therefore<s%>, ye bloodthirsty <S%H582>men<s%>.
For they <S%H559>speak<s%> against thee <S%H4209>wickedly<s%>, And thine <S%H6145>enemies<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> thy name in <S%H7723>vain<s%>.
Do not I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Jehovah, that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H6962>thee<s%>? And am not I grieved with those that rise up against <S%H8618>thee<s%>?
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them with <S%H8503>perfect<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>: They are become mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
Search <S%H2713><s%> <S%H410>me<s%>, O God, and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%>: <S%H974>Try<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>, and know my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%>;
And <S%H7200>see<s%> if there be any <S%H6090>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H5148>me<s%>, And lead me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>.
